thread.title: Kid Ink Performs "Swish" Live At LA Clippers Game
thread.title_full: Kid Ink Performs "Swish" Live At LA Clippers Game

author: Kevin Goddard
title: Kid Ink Performs "Swish" Live At LA Clippers Game
text: Home > Music > Kid Ink Performs "Swish" Live At LA Clippers Game Kid Ink Performs "Swish" Live At LA Clippers Game 5 2 417 Posted by Kevin Goddard , Feb 27, 2017 at 11:47pm Watch Kid Ink perform his single "Swish" during halftime of the LA Clipper games last week. Coming off the release of his 2 Chainz -assisted single “Swish” a few weeks ago, Los Angeles rapper Kid Ink made way his by the Staples Center last week and performed the single during the halftime of the Los Angeles Clippers game (sans Tity Boi though) From backstage footage to taking center court, watch Ink perform his Dre Moon & Yung Berg -produced single with the help of the Clippers cheerleaders dancing in the background in this Born Original-shot film (below). Check out footage/performance & share your thoughts on it in the comments. (Single available for purchase on iTunes ).
